mapper.update:
update BOT_TRACK_DETAIL
NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SESSION_ID = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SERVER_NAME = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTH_VENDOR = #{authVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACK_CODE = #{trackCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRACK_DATA = #{trackData,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update BOT_TRACK_DETAIL set NODE_ID = #{nodeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, USER_NAME = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SESSION_ID = #{sessionId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SERVER_ID = #{serverId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SERVER_NAME = #{serverName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUTH_VENDOR = #{authVendor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACK_CODE = #{trackCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRACK_DATA = #{trackData,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOT_TRACK_DETAIL where BIZ_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM BOT_TRACK_DETAIL WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} and BIZ_TYPE = 0 ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
